.. _`design_system_components_bannercontainer`:

BannerContainer
===============

.. figure:: images/component_bannercontainer.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

A colored banner for displaying text messages.
Semantic variants can emphasize the use as warning, information etc.


API Documentation
-----------------

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-messages.banners.index.BannerContainer`


Related Components
------------------
